Segment.name: CDD
Segment.comment: To provide information relative to a line item adjustment

Field.name: AdjustmentReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating reason for debit or credit memo or adjustment to invoice, debit or credit memo, or payment

Field.name: CreditDebitFlagCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether amount is a credit or debit

Field.name: AssignedIdentification
Field.comment: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: PriceBracketIdentifier
Field.comment: Identifier assigned by the vendor for a specific price bracket

Field.name: CreditDebitQuantity
Field.comment: Number of supplier units credited or debited

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitPriceDifference
Field.comment: Per unit (case) price or allowance/charge difference between original billing and corrected amount (may be unit full list price or allowance/charge where item was not on original billing or where full credit/debit amount is being transacted, i.e., returns or contested quantities)

Field.name: UnitPrice1
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Field.name: UnitPrice2
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.
